/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the urban hustle below. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a city that is both vibrant and tranquil.
